listing-unavailable: We’re sorry, but this listing is no longer available
item-not-available: This item is no longer available

remove-modal.title: Remove listing
remove-modal.answer: This action cannot be undone and you will lose any current counter offers! To proceed with the removal, make a selection below.
remove-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to remove this listing?
remove-modal.radio-text: Yes, I’m absolutely sure. Please remove my listing!
remove-modal.removal-successful: Your listing has been successfully removed!
remove-modal.create-listing-suggestion: Feel free to create another listing at any time

accept-counter-offer-modal.title: Accept counter offer
accept-counter-offer-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to accept the offer from {{username}} ?
accept-counter-offer-modal.note: Feel free to send include a message. How exciting!
accept-counter-offer-modal.radio-text: Yes, I’m sure I’d like to accept the offer

deny-counter-offer-modal.title: Deny counter offer
deny-counter-offer-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to deny the offer from {{username}} ?
deny-counter-offer-modal.note: If you’d like the user to revise their offer, include a message below. They’ll be notified and be able to submit a new offer.
deny-counter-offer-modal.radio-text: Yes, I’m sure I’d like to deny the offer

deny-success-modal.title: Offer denial sent
deny-success-modal.answer: {{username}} has been notified that you’ve denied their offer.
deny-success-modal.note: They may follow-up with another counter, so keep your eyes peeled!

offer-accepted-modal.title: Offer Accepted
offer-accepted-modal.answer: Congratulations! You’ve accepted {{username}} offer! This is what you will receive.

trade-counter.explain-what-sets-you-and-your-nfts-apar: Explain what sets you and your NFTs apart

submit-counter-offer-modal.title: Submit counter offer
submit-counter-offer-modal.question: Are you sure you’d like to offer the items below?
submit-counter-offer-modal.answer: You’ll be able to remove your offer but only if its not accepted by the listing owner.
